attributes.action: reduce pollution, cut greenhouse gases and encourage recycling by increasing the rate of Landfill Tax by an extra £10 per tonne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cheapest way to dispose of waste is still to throw it into polluting landfill, a significant source of greenhouse gas, rather than recycling.
By increasing the cost of landfill, the Landfill Tax encourages businesses and councils to produce less waste and recycle more.
But the rate of tax is too low for this to be effective.
